title: 深入分析双语对照功能实现和未生效原因
description: 检查BilingualPlugin代码、事件触发机制、配置文件、FileOutputer实现，找出双语对照未生效的根本原因

title: 对比source/AiNiee和ModuleFolders的功能差异
description: 详细对比两个版本的功能列表，找出缺失的功能模块，特别是GUI独有的功能和CLI/TUI新增的功能

title: 分析WebServer和TUI功能的完整性与差异
description: 检查Tools/WebServer和ModuleFolders/UserInterface的功能实现，对比source/AiNiee的GUI功能，找出缺失的部分

title: Deep analysis: Compare source/AiNiee EditView with ModuleFolders TUI and Web for core translation features
description: Analyze EditViewPage.py in source, identify core translation UI features (preview, comparison, real-time updates) and compare with TUIEditor.py and Web Monitor.tsx

title: Fix bilingual config default value in preset.json
description: Change enable_bilingual_output from false to true in Resource/platforms/preset.json. This is P0 critical fix as identified in the analysis.

title: Add search dialog to TUI
description: Implement SearchDialog in ModuleFolders/UserInterface/Editor/ similar to Qt version. Search through source/translation text in TUIEditor.

title: Add Monaco Editor to Web
description: Implement online editor using Monaco Editor in Tools/WebServer/pages/. Edit cache data directly in browser with syntax highlighting.

title: Add resume from breakpoint detection to Web
description: Implement cache detection on startup in Web. Allow continuing interrupted translations from last state.

title: 修复双语对照配置默认值
description: 将 Resource/platforms/preset.json 中的 enable_bilingual_output 从 false 改为 true，使双语对照功能默认启用

title: TUI 添加搜索对话框
description: 在 TUIEditor 中添加搜索功能，支持文本搜索和导航

title: Web 添加在线编辑器
description: 在 Web 版本中添加 Monaco Editor 编辑器，支持在线编辑翻译内容

title: Web 添加断点续传检测
description: 在 Web 版本启动时检测 cache，支持断点续传功能

title: Web添加断点续传检测
description: 在Web启动时检测是否存在未完成的翻译任务缓存，提供继续翻译的选项

title: TUI 添加搜索对话框
description: 在 TUIEditor 中添加搜索功能对话框，支持搜索和定位翻译内容

title: Web 添加在线编辑器 (Monaco Editor)
description: 在 Web 版本中添加基于 Monaco Editor 的在线编辑器，支持语法高亮和代码编辑功能

title: TUI 添加定时任务 UI
description: 在 TUI 版本中添加定时任务配置界面

title: Web 添加定时任务 UI
description: 在 Web 版本中添加定时任务配置界面

title: Qt 添加双语对照显示
description: 在 Qt GUI 版本中添加双语对照显示功能

title: TUI: Add search dialog functionality
description: Implement search dialog for TUI similar to Qt SearchDialog. Allow users to search for text in translated content. Qt reference: source/AiNiee/UserInterface/EditView/Search/

title: Web: Enhance cache editor with Monaco Editor
description: Integrate Monaco Editor for better code/text editing experience in Web CacheEditor. Current implementation exists but needs enhancement for better UX.

title: TUI: Add scheduled task configuration UI
description: Create TUI interface for SchedulerManager. Backend service exists at ModuleFolders/Infrastructure/Automation/SchedulerManager.py but lacks user interface.

title: Web: Add scheduled task configuration UI
description: Create Web interface for scheduling translation tasks. Backend support exists, needs frontend implementation.

title: Qt: Add bilingual comparison display to MonitoringPage
description: Implement side-by-side bilingual comparison view in Qt MonitoringPage, similar to TUI/Web implementations. Reference: source/AiNiee/UserInterface/EditView/Monitoring/MonitoringPage.py

title: Change default theme from dark to light in uiPreferences.ts
description: Update getDefaultUiPreferences() to return 'light' instead of 'dark' as the default themeMode

title: Verify theme switching functionality works correctly
description: Test that theme toggle between light/dark/system works properly after changing the default

title: Analyze AI translation platform market and competitors
description: Research Smartcat, DeepL and other AI translation platforms to identify features and capabilities

title: Identify feature gaps between AiNiee and professional platforms
description: Compare current features with professional platforms and identify missing capabilities

title: Update PROMPT.md with future AI translation platform roadmap
description: Add comprehensive section about future platform features, market analysis, and implementation roadmap

title: Research AI translation integration opportunities
description: Find potential integration points for external translation services and APIs
